title: Sweethearts
overview: From the creator of "Love is Blind" comes Sweethearts which follows the lives of 6 teenage couples in Charleston, SC. As they navigate the end of high school and get ready for college, each couple must decide if they will begin the next chapter of their lives togetherâ€¦ or begin their adult lives single. Whatever they choose, one thing's for sure: it will change the course of their lives forever.
